sys_hub_action_type_definition.annotation: Fetch data to be populated into products_table record
sys_hub_action_type_definition.description: Data stream to make an outbound HTTP request to an API, query the results to return farmer ID, item, and category and insert into the products_table record
sys_hub_action_type_definition.name: Get Products - Chrome

variable.display_value: How will you identify each record
How will you parse each item into an object
